clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Orlistat Versus Placebo for Adult Obesity Treatment
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Study, Parallel, Double-blind, Multicenter for Evaluation of Efficacy of Orlistat 60 mg for Adult Obesity Treatment Compared to Placebo Treatment.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate efficacy of orlistat 60 mg compared to placebo on weight loss and abdominal adiposity in obese adults treatment.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Caregiver, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Efficacy of Orlistat 60 mg compared to placebo in obesity treatment based on weight loss and abdominal adiposity during 24 weeks.

secondary_outcome.measure: Adverse event incidence of orlistat 60mg when used for weight loss in adults
